PLAN1D_T Struct Reference

An arrays of 1-d plans that are used to do 2-d FFTs only over specified region. More...

int ncomp
 For a NxN array, only convert center ncomp*ncomp to Fourier space.

Detailed Description

An arrays of 1-d plans that are used to do 2-d FFTs only over specified region.

Field Documentation

int PLAN1D_T::ncomp

For a NxN array, only convert center ncomp*ncomp to Fourier space.

Array of plans for 1-d FFT.
